# Ryszard Skwarski

Ryszard Skwarski (5 April 1930 in Zakroczym - 1 June 1996) was a Polish sprint canoer who competed in the late 1950s and early 1960s. Competing in two Summer Olympics, he earned his best finish of fourth in the K-1 4 Ã— 500 m event at Rome in 1960.

*[https://web.archive.org/web/20200418081939/https://www.sports-reference.com/olympics/athletes/sk/ryszard-skwarski-1.html Sports-reference.com profile]
